title: Profile Card
description: Frontend developer profile with Download CV button.
cardClass: relative group border-4 border-sky-900 rounded-2xl h-52 w-80 bg-sky-700 p-5 flex flex-col items-start gap-4 shadow-lg
buttonClass: bg-gray-50 text-sky-800 border px-3 py-2 flex items-center gap-3 rounded-lg font-semibold hover:bg-sky-900 hover:text-gray-50 z-10

title: Backend Engineer
description: Focused on building APIs and server-side applications with Node.js and databases.
cardClass: relative group rounded-xl h-full w-full bg-gradient-to-br from-green-500 to-emerald-600 p-5 flex flex-col justify-between
buttonClass: mt-4 px-4 py-2 bg-white text-green-600 font-semibold rounded-lg shadow-md hover:bg-gray-200 transition

title: Send Feedback
cardClass: bg-gray-200 rounded-xl shadow-md w-full h-full p-4 flex flex-col justify-between
buttonClass: self-end mt-2 w-10 h-10 flex items-center justify-center rounded-lg bg-gray-200 hover:bg-gray-300 transition text-gray-600 font-bold
inputClass: w-full h-24 p-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-400 resize-none
